scriptmodule.description: This Module is responsible for Opening a new Fresh Homepage whithout Cookies.

command.name: waitForVisible
command.target: css= #wrapper > div.sidebar > div.lightbox__wrapper--centered > div.lightbox__wrapper--centered-content > button > svg > use

command.name: click
command.target: css= #wrapper > div.sidebar > div.lightbox__wrapper--centered > div.lightbox__wrapper--centered-content > button > svg > use
